SEARCH
Package com.monexel.expensetracker.exception

Class MyGlobalExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
com.monexel.expensetracker.exception.MyGlobalExceptionHandler
@RestControllerAdvice public class MyGlobalExceptionHandler extends Object
Global exception handler for the Expense Tracker application.

This class uses @RestControllerAdvice to handle exceptions globally across all controllers. It provides custom responses for various application-specific exceptions and validation errors.

Handled Exceptions:

  • ResourceNotFoundException - When a requested resource is not found.
  • APIException - For generic API-related errors.
  • ResourceAlreadyExistsException - When attempting to create a resource that already exists.
  • UserNotFoundException - When a user is not found in the system.
  • InsufficientFundsException - When a transaction fails due to insufficient funds.
  • MethodArgumentNotValidException - For validation errors on request payloads.

Response Structure:

Most handlers return an APIResponse object with a message and success flag, wrapped in a ResponseEntity with an appropriate HTTP status code.

Validation Errors:

Validation errors are returned as a Map<String, String> where keys are field names and values are error messages.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Surya Narayanan G
